links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 679
maple: spec := [S,{B=Prod(S,S),C=Union(B,S,Z),S=Prod(Z,C)},labeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size=n), n=0..20);seq(n!*add(binomial(n-2-k,2*k)*binomial(2*k,k)/(k+1), k=0..floor((n-2)/3)), n=0..18);  # _Mark van Hoeij_, May 12 2013
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
